observation: Brophy Financial Planning - Feel Good About Your Financial Future  Skip to content Brophy Financial Planning is proudly owned by G R Baird Financial Group Home Approach Services About Us Contact Us CLIENT LOGIN Search Submit Menu Is your financial future S.M.A.R.T.? Secure. Measurable. Achievable. Responsible. Trustworthy. Find out Our Services Build and Protect Your Assets Life is full of important milestones, unexpected changes and shifting circumstances. Are you getting married? Changing careers? These and other transitions can impact your financial well-being. Plan Your Retirement Our experienced financial planners will help you build a customized financial strategy that protects and grows your savings — so you can stop worrying about the future and start enjoying life to its fullest along the way. Invest for Education There are many ways to protect your children and grandchildren. As you watch them grow up, making sure they’ll have access to the best possible education will empower them with more opportunities to thrive as adults. Pay Less Tax Are you paying more taxes than you need to? We can assess your unique circumstances and recommend the right combination of products and investments with built-in tax benefits. Total Life Strategies Program Our experienced financial planners will help you build a custom financial strategy that fits your life and your goals, now and in the future. The Total Life Strategies Program will help you: Establish your goals (both personal and financial) Understand your risk profile Determine how much money you need to achieve your goals Start Your Program Our Team Graeme D.
